DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study test investigational medication ABT-089 safe effective treatment adult Attention-Deficit/Hyperactivity Disorder ( ADHD ) .
DOC.brief_title: Safety , Tolerability Efficacy Study ABT-089 Adults With Attention-Deficit/Hyperactivity Disorder ( ADHD )
DOC.criteria: Have voluntarily sign informed consent form . Meet diagnostic criterion attentiondeficit/hyperactivity disorder ( ADHD ) base detailed evaluation interview subject . Subject generally good health base medical history , physical examination , clinical lab test ECG . Female subject childbearing potential must negative urine pregnancy test screening baseline agree comply applicable contraceptive requirement . Male subject must agree comply applicable contraceptive requirement . Subject able keep require appointment clinic visit test , include blood draw examination . Subject current past diagnosis schizoaffective disorder , schizophrenia , obsessivecompulsive disorder , druginduced psychosis , bipolar disorder , psychotic disorder . Current diagnosis major depressive disorder , generalize anxiety disorder , PTSD sleep disorder require treatment kind . Subject history , ongoing , serious medical problem . Subject history significant allergic reaction drug . Subject plan begin type behavioral psychotherapy treatment ADHD . Subject require ongoing treatment psychiatric medication .
